name: You
chat: what's going on? how come youre here?

name: Guard
chat: we found a hole in the boundary walls, im keeping watch on it.

name: Guard
chat: why are you so far out of the village?

name: Guard
chat: just strolling? this isnt the place for leisurely walks

name: You
chat: whats going on with the hole in the wall?

name: Guard
chat: its a breach in our defence, we need to find out how it happened

name: Guard
chat: its a miracle nothing got in before we caught it

name: Guard
chat: a team is on their way to patch up the hole

name: Guard
chat: of course, we cant leave the village vulnerable to any potential threats

name: You
chat: you dont know how it got there?

name: Guard
chat: not yet, were investigating, but i suspect it might be sabotage

name: You
chat: sabotage? who would want umbra-fog creatures in the village?

name: Guard
chat: its just a gut feeling; i cant take any chances

name: Guard
chat: anyway, you should head back to the village; its not ideal to be out here
